Summary: Biochemical reaction from fluvastatin to 6-hydroxyfluvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from fluvastatin to 5-hydroxyfluvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP2C9, CYP2D6, CYP1A1 or CYP2C8.
Biochemical reaction from fluvastatin to desisopropyl-dihydro-fluvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C9.
Transport from fluvastatin to fluvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2 or ABCG2.
Transport from fluvastatin to fluvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLCO1B1 or SLCO2B1.
